mapper.select: select cmc , cnt from comments where age_range = 10 and rownum <= 10 order by cnt desc

select cmc , cnt from comments where age_range = 30 and rownum <= 10 order by cnt desc
select cmc , cnt from comments where age_range = 40 and rownum <= 10 order by cnt desc
